Virtual Basic
Keyboard

Virtual simple keyboard is a javascript tool for touch screens on Desktop scenarios. Offering a simple input for letters, symbols and numbers.


1. to use it, download the keyboard.js y keyboard.css files and linked to the .html



<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="keyboard.css">
<script async src="keyboard.js"></script>



2. Add to the supported inputs the "keyboard-input" class.



<input type="text" class="keyboard-input">
